thread.section_title: Experthelp.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Experthelp.com | www.experthelp.com
thread.title: Jeff Howard

author: Jeff Howard
title: Jeff Howard
text: After accepting Microsoft's upgrade request, my keyboard stopped working. After wiping the hard drive I called you to reinstall my Office 365. I shouldn;t have had to but we're all at the mercy of MS. In any event, yyour tech did a very expeditious and professional job and, other than having to pay for something that MS screwed up, I'm very happy and I will not hesitate to use you again.
